fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Hunt: Pick a player within the first phase of the game. When they die, learn what their role truly is. 
- Sniff Out: Learn which direction (up or down) on the playerlist the closest true non-Order non-King is to you. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Target: Pick a player. The next attack you play on them will become Upgraded. [2 uses, 4 CD]
- Bloodlust: Change a card in your hand into a non-special attacking card of your choice. Gains a use every 3 players you outlive. [1 uses, 2 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
- Takedown: Pick a player. Deal 2 HP Unblockable damage at the end of the phase. [1 use, Unique, Night-Only, Unlocks N3]
